title: Leeds Light Up Liverpool
description:
The FC crew react to a wild day in the Premier League as Liverpool lost 2-1 to Leeds, Brighton rolled over Chelsea 4-1, and Tottenham needed a late winner to beat Bournemouth. The guys question if Liverpool can get past their current defensive issues and argue as to why Chelsea came out so flat in what was an emotional game for Brighton. Plus, Jan Aage Fjortoft joins the show to break down Kevin De Bruyne's game winner against Leicester.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Another dreadful loss for Liverpool; Brighton crush Chelsea in Potter's return to the south coast; De Bruyne magic saves Man City again
